instructions.reason_for_call: You received hiking boots that seem like they were already worn, you are unhappy about it and want to ask for a new pair with the same specs. You also want to exchange your jigsaw to a more fancy theme, with 500 pieces less. But you want to keep the same difficulty level.
instructions.known_info: You name is Yara Ito and your zip code is 75284.
instructions.unknown_info: You do not remember your email address

nl_assertions: Agent should exchange items in both orders.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hi! I recently received a pair of hiking boots I ordered, but they look like they've already been worn. I'm not happy about that and would like to get a new pair with the same specifications. Also, I want to exchange a jigsaw puzzle I bought for a fancier theme, but with 500 pieces less, while keeping the same difficulty level. Can you help me with these?

message.content: Hi! I recently received a pair of hiking boots I ordered, but they look like they've already been worn. I'm not happy about that and would like to get a new pair with the same specifications. Also, I want to exchange a jigsaw puzzle I bought for a fancier theme, but with 500 pieces less, while keeping the same difficulty level. Can you help me with these?

messages.content:
I can help — before I can take any actions I need to authenticate you and get a few details so I can locate your orders and confirm they’re eligible for exchange.

Please provide the following:

1) Your email address (or, if you prefer, your first name, last name, and ZIP code). I must use this to find your user id before doing anything else.

2) The order id(s) that contain:
   - the hiking boots you received (please indicate which item in the order is the boots if the order has multiple items), and
   - the jigsaw puzzle you want to exchange (again indicate which item if needed).

3) For each item you want exchanged, tell me what new item you want instead. You can either:
   - provide the new item id(s) if you have them, or
   - tell me the desired options (for example: "same model hiking boots, same size/color — brand X model Y, size 10" and for the puzzle: "fancier theme, 500 pieces fewer, same difficulty level") and I can look up matching item ids for you.

4) Which payment method should be used to handle any price difference or refund (refunds must go to original payment method or an existing gift card; exchanges require a payment method to pay/receive difference). If you want a gift card used, confirm it has enough balance.

Important notes / what I’ll check and confirm before proceeding:
- I will first verify your user id and the orders’ statuses (exchanges are allowed only for delivered orders).
- For delivered-order exchanges I must confirm you’ve specified ALL items you want exchanged in that order (exchanges can only be done once per delivered order).
- I will then list the exchange details (order id, item ids being exchanged, new item ids, and payment method) and ask you to confirm with a clear "yes" before I submit the exchange request.

Send the email (or name + ZIP), the order ids, and either the new item ids or the product option details and preferred payment method and I’ll proceed to look up your account and orders.

messages.content:
Sure! I don't remember my email address, but my name is Yara Ito and my ZIP code is 75284.

I have two orders:
- The hiking boots I received are in order #12345, and they are the only item in that order.
- The jigsaw puzzle I want to exchange is in order #67890, and it is also the only item in that order.

For the exchanges:
- For the hiking boots, I want a new pair with the same model, size, and color.
- For the jigsaw puzzle, I want a fancier theme with 500 pieces fewer but the same difficulty level.

Please let me know what payment method I should use or if you need more information from me.
